title: Executive Order 11608-Termination of Federal Field Committee for Development Planning in Alaska
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States, Executive Order No. 11182 of October 2, 1964, as amended, is revoked and the Federal Field Committee for Development Planning in Alaska established thereby is abolished. Executive Order No. 11386 of December 28, 1967, to the extent that it pertains to the Federal Field Committee for Development Planning in Alaska, is revoked. The Secretary of Commerce shall make such arrangements as may be necessary relating to the termination of the Committee.
citation: Richard Nixon, Executive Order 11608-Termination of Federal Field Committee for Development Planning in Alaska Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/307146
